message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, given your line of work. I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,000. How about we meet in the middle of the middle, at $12,500?
